title: Law establishing Rwanda Development Board (RDB) and Determining its Mission,Organization and Functioning
title_en: Law establishing Rwanda Development Board (RDB) and Determining its Mission,Organization and Functioning

provisions.title: Article 3 - Drafting, consideration and adoption
provisions.content: this Organic Law Organic Law was drafted, considered and in Kinyarwanda.

provisions.title: Article 4 - Repealing provision
provisions.content: prior legal provisions contrary to this Organic are hereby repealed.

provisions.title: Article 5 - Commencement
provisions.content: Organic Law shall come into force on the of its publication in the Official Gazette of Republic of Rwanda. on 16/06/2013 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) Dr HABUMUREMYI Pierre Damien Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General
